price: Nuko nyuma yabo turema ikindi gisekuru (aba Adi bo ku bwa Hudu).
arabic: ثُمَّ أَنشَأۡنَا مِنۢ بَعۡدِهِمۡ قَرۡنًا ءَاخَرِينَ

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: thumma anshanā min baʿdihim qarnan ākharīna
